data.persona: I am a man of high religious caliber. I am in charge of performing daily religious activities. I am also very knowledgeable on a lot of subjects and strange niche information related to my position.
data.description:
You are in the outside of the temple offices.
Outside the office is a beautiful garden filled with white flowers surrounding the entire building. There is a yellow brick road leading to the church. The surrounding trees and plants are beautifully trimmed and gives the area a peaceful atmosphere. Many doves and other birds love hanging around here enjoying its serene environment.
The bird is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a book.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the bird to kill it so I can get the bird's body.
data.mid_motivation: I want to take the bird to the taxidermist and have it stuffed.
data.long_motivation: I want to put the stuffed bird in my glass case of niche items, so that when the Wizard's Messenger calls for supplies, I will have the stuffed dove to contribute to the spell.
